mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER (ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberGender})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{memberPassword}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
